training_augmentation.description: Data augmentation for training set only

width_shift_range.comment: Horizontal shift up to 10% of width

height_shift_range.comment: Vertical shift up to 10% of height

shear_range.comment: Shear transformation angle in counter-clockwise direction

vertical_flip.comment: NOT recommended for racing photos (cars don't flip vertically)

fill_mode.comment: How to fill pixels outside boundaries after transformations

validation_augmentation.description: Validation/test sets: only rescaling, no augmentation

advanced_augmentation.description: Advanced augmentation techniques (optional, requires imgaug or albumentations)
advanced_augmentation.comment: Enable if training accuracy plateaus. Requires additional dependencies.

notes.purpose: Data augmentation helps prevent overfitting by artificially expanding the training dataset
notes.recommendation: Start with default settings. If overfitting occurs (train acc >> val acc), increase augmentation strength
racing_specific: Horizontal flip is OK (cars can be photographed from either side)
Vertical flip is NOT OK (cars don't drive upside down)
Rotation should be limited (±15° max, cars are usually level)
Brightness variation is important (different lighting conditions)
